languages.text: {n}Глядя, как дыхание Эвейна выравнивается, Идира присвистывает.{/n} "О как, ледышка... может, еще и глаз обратно ему отрастишь?"
{n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя, как дыхание Эвейна выравнивается, Идира присвистывает.{/n} "О как, ледышка... может, еще и глаз обратно ему отрастишь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Chilly... Can you make his eye grow back too?"
{n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Chilly... Can you make his eye grow back too?"
{n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

{n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"
{n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

languages.text: {n}Idira pfeift, als Evaynes Atmung gleichmäßiger wird.{/n} "Ist das zu glauben, Eismann ... Könnt Ihr auch sein Auge wieder zuwachsen lassen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira pfeift, als Evaynes Atmung gleichmäßiger wird.{/n} "Ist das zu glauben, Eismann ... Könnt Ihr auch sein Auge wieder zuwachsen lassen?"

languages.text: {n}Idira siffle en voyant la respiration d'Evayne se calmer.{/n} « Joli travail... Vous pourriez pas aussi lui faire repousser son œil ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira siffle en voyant la respiration d'Evayne se calmer.{/n} « Joli travail... Vous pourriez pas aussi lui faire repousser son œil ? »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉看着艾维尼的呼吸慢慢平稳下来，不禁吹起了口哨。{/n}“你这招可真厉害，冰人儿……你能让他的眼睛也长回来吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉看着艾维尼的呼吸慢慢平稳下来，不禁吹起了口哨。{/n}“你这招可真厉害，冰人儿……你能让他的眼睛也长回来吗？”

languages.text: {n}イディラはエヴァインの呼吸が安定するのを見て口笛を吹く。{/n}「やるじゃない、氷の君…眼球も再生させられそう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはエヴァインが息を吐き出すのを見て口笛を吹く。{/n}「やるじゃない、アイスマン…意識は戻せそう？」
{n}イディラはエヴァインの呼吸が安定するのを見て口笛を吹く。{/n}「やるじゃない、氷の君…眼球も再生させられそう？」

languages.text: {n}Idira silba mientras observa cómo la respiración de Evayne se estabiliza.{/n} «Vaya, qué curioso, hombre de hielo... ¿Puede hacer que le vuelva a crecer el ojo también?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira silba mientras observa cómo la respiración de Evayne se estabiliza.{/n} «Vaya, qué curioso, hombre de hielo... ¿Puede hacer que le vuelva a crecer el ojo también?».

languages.text: {n}İdira, Evayne'in nefes alış verişinin düzeldiğini görünce bir ıslık patlatıyor.{/n} "Buz küpüne bak hele. Gözünü de geri koyabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira whistles as she watches Evayne's breathing even out.{/n} "Fancy that, iceman... Can you make his eye grow back too?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, Evayne'in nefes alış verişinin düzeldiğini görünce bir ıslık patlatıyor.{/n} "Buz küpüne bak hele. Gözünü de geri koyabilir misin?"
